N'gandwe Mwaba (a mụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Omenkà Zambia , onye meriri na 2019 Ngoma Award for Most Outstanding Male Visual Artist
A mụrụ N'gandwe Mwaba n'afọ 1982 na Kitwe
Ọ kụziiri onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Lusaka.
Ihe osise nke Mwaba na-ese nke ọma tinyere ihe osise ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe so n'ihe osise Zambia gosipụtara na African Studies Gallery na Tel Aviv n'afọ 2018.
